availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas J. Wilgus (Trigg County, Kentucky, blacksmith.)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Killy Wilgus in Trigg County, Kentucky, on January 12, 1852. Father of Jesse Wilgus and William A. Wilgus. Blacksmith in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Cadiz, p. 193.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Cadiz, p. 54A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Trigg County Marriages, Film 00032133, p. 143.
"Thomas J. Wilgus (1826-1887)," Find A Grave, Memorial 107373664, accessed May 3, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/107373664.
